comments_since_last_sample.body: If it was Yogi in place of Modi, Yogi Pope ka ghar wapsi kar deta 😂

Had modi visited Shankaracharya or any other Hindu religious leader there would have been a  big hue and cry by now that constitution and secularism is in danger.

Saala itna thoda baat karna tha toh Pope ko whatsapp kar deta.
Waha jane ki kya jarurat thi😑

Government of India also gives people free food and rice bags to people but unlike missionaries GOI does not ask them to change their god. 

Rice bag converts don't make a good christian anyway.

The conversion business carried by the missionaries must stop in India.
